author: djencks
msg: GERONIMO-371, 393, 372. Refactor jsr-77 naming and restructure specification of ref names to parallel jsr-77

author: chirino
msg: So that eclipse goal can work

author: gdamour
msg: o Update the way CMR fields are mapped.
The previous implementation was using the <ejb-relation-name> and <ejb-relationship-role-name> elements, which were optional elements.
The new implementation uses the fact that at least one <relationship-role-source> and <cmr-field> couple exists for a given relationship.

o It is no more required to configure a TransactionManager for EJB having OTM or MTM relationships. One uses the TransactionManager contained by the TransactionContextManager associated to the provided EARContext.
